name: Simple looper (workflow repeater)
plugin_instructions:
You do not need a plugin to make loops (repeat workflows) in backend workflows. Search the forum for recursion in API workflows and backend workflows so you see how it is done.
 
That said, this plugin works with workflows that run in the page, in other words, in the browser (client side).
